com.zycus.pm.api
Interface IPermissionResolver

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultPermissionResolver, DefaultPermissionResolver2
public interface IPermissionResolver

this is the last point of execution where main resolving logic is written. this will be called from IPermissionStoreAPI.

Since:
: Apr 29, 2009 : 1:42:58 PM
Author:
Aniruddha Dutta Chowdhury

Method Summary
 boolean isRightPermitted(BaseRight right, IPermissionEntity entity, IPermisibleResource resource)
          this method will be finally be called from IPermissionRights.isRightPermitted(BaseRight) there is one default implementation provided by the component and at the same time any application using this component can provide their own IPermissionResolver while calling IPermissionManagerAPI via IPermissionManagerAPI.getRight(IPermissionEntity, IPermisibleResource, IPermissionResolver) or can set their default IPermissionResolver by using IPermissionManagerAPI.setDefaultPermissionResolver(IPermissionResolver)
 void setPermissionStore(IPermissionStoreAPI permissionStore)
          This will enable the resolver with a mechanism to get data from database.
 

Method Detail

setPermissionStore

void setPermissionStore(IPermissionStoreAPI permissionStore)
This will enable the resolver with a mechanism to get data from database.

Parameters:
permissionStore - is instance of IPermissionStoreAPI, with which this resolver can get data.

isRightPermitted

boolean isRightPermitted(BaseRight right,
                         IPermissionEntity entity,
                         IPermisibleResource resource)
this method will be finally be called from IPermissionRights.isRightPermitted(BaseRight) there is one default implementation provided by the component and at the same time any application using this component can provide their own IPermissionResolver while calling IPermissionManagerAPI via IPermissionManagerAPI.getRight(IPermissionEntity, IPermisibleResource, IPermissionResolver) or can set their default IPermissionResolver by using IPermissionManagerAPI.setDefaultPermissionResolver(IPermissionResolver)

Parameters:
right - is BaseRight which is allowed or denied to be checked
entity - is IPermissionEntity which is allowed or denied is to be checked
resource - is IPermisibleResource for which the BaseRight is allowed or not to be checked
Returns:
true if the specified IPermissionEntity is allowed the BaseRight on the specified IPermisibleResource, false otherwise
See Also:
IPermissionRights.isRightPermitted(BaseRight)
